item.title: HugoBook+GithubAction
item.description: In Windows10, build personal website via Hugo-book and Github Actions # This blog is about how to use Hugo to create the local website, and then deploy it on GitHub via Github Action. Everything is step by step. Prerequisites # Git Windows 10 VScode Github account Install Hugo # In Windows10, right click Windows Powershell and click run as administrator. Refer to How to install chocolatey in Windows to install chocolatey.

item.title: 4 levels of protein structure
item.description: There are four levels of protein structure: primary, secondary, tertiary and quaternary. Primary Structure. # A proteinâ€™s primary structure is the unique sequence of amino acids in each polypeptide chain that makes up the protein. Reference: # 3.9: Proteins - Protein Structure Thanks! # Really appreciate your time for reading my blog, and bless you enjoy your day! item.title: Shell Commands
item.description: Shell Commands # How to discard changes in VScode? # Navigate to reporsitory (has .github folder) with changes. Then, git restore <file>
